data.eml:eml: Discovery of four new species of the genus Planaeschna from Southwestern China (Odonata: Anisoptera: Aeshnidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Hao-Miao, Cai, Qing-Hua (2013): Discovery of four new species of the genus Planaeschna from Southwestern China (Odonata: Anisoptera: Aeshnidae). Zootaxa 3741 (2): 254-264, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3741.2.4
